welcome: What to cook? is not only a recipe app, it is, in fact, your cookbook.
wayToEnjoy: way to enjoy a variety of fresh ingredients in one satisfying meal
description1: Database of recipes that can be replenished
description2: Flexible search for desired and unwanted ingredients
description3: Ability to add your own recipes with photos
newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter. Stay updated with the latest news and special offers.
